image


Battle Beast was born in the year 2008 in Helsinki, Finland. Battle Beast represents the traditional heavy metal sound - Bringing you high screams, old school riffs and strong choruses. In one word: Power.


In May 2010, Battle Beast had its big opportunity to warm up Ex-Iron Maiden singer Blaze Bayley as they were performing in Finland during the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Promise and TerrorÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½- tour. Battle Beast played in 4 of 5 shows with another metal band Merging Flare on BlazeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s tour in finland and the feedback on the gigs was very positive.


After the short tour, Battle Beast attended to W:O:A Metal Battle in Finland and won the national contest. The prize was to get to play to Wacken Open Air in Germany and represent Finland in the international Metal Battle finals where out of 26 different countries, Battle Beast won the whole thing. They won full endorsements and high quality equipment from Eden, Washburn, Mapex, Paiste, Marshall and Woodbrass. Also an opportunity to sign an international record deal. Battle Beast had many offers from other record companies after winning the Metal Battle 2010.

Finland's Battle Beast are set to release their third studio album, entitled Unholy Savior, on January 9th (Europe), January 12th (UK) and January 13th (North America) via Nuclear Blast.
